  • USB & Ethernet & Wi-Fi
Description: At 11.8 inches long and weighting only 1500 grams, the Avision AD225WN incorporates a built-in automatic document feeder (ADF) and card scanner in a compact unit. With the innovative design of a fordable automatic document feeder and a front/rear tray, the AD225WN is easy to travel with and lets you bring productivity of batches scanning to any workplace.
Meta: features_text:
Productive and Flexible

The AD225WN is productive at scan rate of up to 25 ppm and 50 ipm through the built-in 25-page auto document feeder and accommodate document up to 14”. To capture high quality card image, the AD225WN also includes special front and rear tray to handle plastic ID cards, driver licenses, and even embossed cards up to 1.25 mm or paper up to legal size (8.5 x 14 in.) and weight between 27 and 413 g/m2 (rear tray: 50~105 g/m2).

Effective network Scanning

With the network port at the back side, the AD225WN allows you to use it as a network scanner.  This means users in the intranet environment can share the scanner and obtain the scanned image from their individual computer.

Two Eject Paths

If your single-page document is loaded from the front or rear feeder, the scanner provides two eject paths. Document can be ejected to the opposite side or to the same side of the feeder. Switch between these paths on the TWAIN user interface and select an eject path according to your need. *Plastic card only available for front tray feeding.

Easy to scan with a press of a button

With Avision’s newly developed software application- Button Manager , the AD225WN scans both sides of a page directly to PDF, searchable PDF, JPEG, or to office applications like Word or Excel® with a press of a button. The AD225WN  automatically recognizes the size of each document, detect and straighten for skew, and show images in their proper orientation. Plus, the scanned image can be sent directly to your specified destination including e-mail, printer, image editing software application, or even a cloud server such as Google Drive or Microsoft SharePoint.

What we have bundled

The Avision AD225WN comes with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and is bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager , AVScan , and PaperPort . With Button Manager , you can create searchable PDFs, scan and send images to e-mail, printer, or other destinations with a simple press of the Scan button. The AVScan X and PaperPort are highly effective image processing and document management software that helps you streamline your task more efficiently.  

Features

  • Fast scan rate up to 25 pages per minute and 50 images per minute
  • 25-page Auto Document Feeder (80 g/m2)
  • Front Feeder accepts embossed card up to 1.25mm and paper up to legal size and weight between 27 and 413 g/m2
  • Rear Feeder accepts embossed card up to 1.25mm and paper up to legal size and weight between 50 and 105 g/m2
  • Auto crop and straighten a skew document
  • Press and scan to cloud servers via the bundled software Button Manager
  •  Press and paste your scanned image directly to your text editor via the bundled software Button Manager
  • Earth-friendly LED technology
  • Long page scanning: 118” ( <300 dpi,  color )
  • Auto power off setting

Meta: accessories_0_acc_description: Silex DS-510 (EU-UK): Gigabit 2-port USB2.0 Device Server. Enables Fujitsu document scanners to be connected to an Ethernet Network and shared by multiple users.
Meta: features_text:
Fast, reliable scanning performance for better productivity

The compact, lightweight fi-70F high-speed scanner is ideal for front office, reception, patient intake, and retail environments. It quickly scans all major types of identification and small cards, including driver's licenses, passports, military IDs, insurance cards, credit cards, photos, and small survey forms.

Capture details in just one second

The scanner delivers clean, crisp scans up to 105 mm x 148 mm (4.1 in. x 5.8 in.) in color, grayscale, and monochrome with true, 600 dpi optical resolution. When time is critical, users can scan documents at 300 dpi in monochrome or 8-bit grayscale in just one second, and 24-bit color scans at 200 dpi take just 1.3 seconds.

Precise scanning in any situation

The scanner increases user productivity with coverless scanning that eliminates the repetitive task of opening and closing the cover before and after each scan. Automatic deskewing, cropping, and rotating functionalities ensures that documents are scanned accurately even when the cover is open.

Stress-free usability for operators

Comfortable scanning with a user-friendly design

Equipped with the scan button on the front of the scanner, users can complete scanning work by simply placing a document and pressing the scan button. This helps users increase the speed of capturing multiple documents with minimal workload. High-speed USB 2.0 connectivity also combines outstanding performance and easy installation. Without the need of the AC cable, the scanner can be used in places where power supply is not available.

Environment-friendly specifications

The fi-70F is designed to incorporate advanced energy efficient technologies. Not only does it comply with ENERGY STAR and RoHS, but its entire manufacturing process complies with strict environment regulations.

Advanced software improves workflow before and after scanning

The functions of PaperStream IP and PaperStream Capture, scanner driver and capture software for fi Series respectively, improves operators’ overall productivity, by reducing the number of operations before and after scanning. For passport and ID card scanning, personal information such as full name, document number, nationality, contained in the MRZ* (Machine Readable Zone), can be extracted for efficient entry of customer information. *Supports recognition of MRZ on passports and ID cards, as defined by the ICAO (International Civil Aviation Organization). Passport MRZ layout is defined as two rows of 44 characters each (Doc 9303 TD3 format). ID card MRZ layout defined as three rows of 30 characters (TD1 format) or as two rows of 36 characters (TD2 format).

Meta: features_text:
"DirectScan" breakthrough. PC-less scanning

Save scans directly to network folders Equipped with the "DirectScan" function*, the fi-8040 enables PC-less scan and saves scanned data directly to network folders or FTP servers by setting destination storage locations in advance. The setting can be done easily with a web browser for a single unit or with the "Scanner Central Admin Desktop" software for multiple units. The scanner acts as a platform for business solutions to share data among multiple departments, work teams, and remote work environments. *DirectScan function is available only when the time is synchronized with an NTP server. Attach scans to e-mails directly and share with multiple users Compact but equipped with a 4.3-inch touch screen, the scanner allows ease of designating recipients, attaching and sending scans, all from the touch screen. Filenames and sizes can be verified before sending. The fi-8040 is an ideal scanner for use with multiple users in office as well, for information sharing, as a possible replacement for the conventional fax.    

Seamless integration with client systems. Workflow efficiency

Use the PaperStream NX Manager* to link scanned data to business software applications and cloud services. Explore enhanced workflow efficiency, and implement work operations smoothly to include wider variety of locations on trusted and stable environment. *PaperStream NX Manager becomes available with firmware updates in October 2023.      

Boosted usability and flexibility for any environment

User-friendly 4.3-inch touch screen for easy operation Equipped with the touch screen on its compact body of the scanner, users are able to check scanned data before saving, attaching, and sending scans, all on the touch screen.   *Thumbnails of scanned data are shown for confirmation only when PC-less scanning.   Supports scanning of wide range of documents The scanner handles various types of documents, including plastic cards and A3, bi-folded, and multi-layered documents without the need for a carrier sheet. Plastic cards up to a thickness of 0.7mm can be read as well.  

Optimized high-quality image data for business use

Combining the new CIS sensor with the GI image processing engine suppresses the occurrence of color shifts. "PFU Clear Image Capture" produces high definition images for data extraction while keeping power consumption to the minimum and reduces startup times.

Description:
• 120ppm & 500 sheet ADF

  • State-of-the-art paper protection

Tags: Avision, Fujitsu, High Speed, Mid Volume, Ricoh
Meta: features_text:
The RICOH fi-8820 Image Scanner offers you the performance, reliability, and usability to maximise productivity. The result? A highly flexible, reliable and cost-effective scanning operation.

The RICOH fi-8820 is designed for operations that need high-performance on a limited budget. With a generous Automatic Document Feeder capacity of 500 sheets and 120ppm speed, it will handle continuous scanning of large volumes of documents. Consistent performance is ensured by high-speed USB 3.2 or Gigabit LAN connectivity, and the fact that its wide 105° opening angle and internal LED lights make it easy to maintain. Stoppages are avoided thanks to state-of-the-art paper protection features such as Stapled Document Detection, and the Intelligent Multi-Feed function, which understands when to stop for labels, sticky notes or photos, and when not to. Many different types of documents can be handled without fuss or interruption because of its two feed paths; the classic U-turn ADF, and the straight-through path which accepts documents up to 1.25mm thick. And mixed batches are no problem thanks to the Automatic Profile Selection feature. RICOH Image Scanners deliver industry-leading OCR accuracy rates and exceptional image quality. This is achieved through a combination of our unique Clear Image Capture technology, and PaperStream IP driver which also removes noise and optimises file size for lower-cost storage. The RICOH fi-8820 offers a complete package for high volume scanning. The hardware comes with its own PaperStream software, but can be flexibly deployed with any other capture application. It has also been optimised for use with industry-leading PaperStream Capture Pro software. Tiered service plans and fixed-cost consumables and replacement parts offer predictable running costs. Back and front-side post-imprinting options are also available. Engineered by the world leader in document scanners with decades of market leading innovation and expertise, the RICOH fi-8820 also brings the reassurance of the most trusted scanning solutions on the planet.

Meta: features_text:
The SCAMAX® 3x1 brings true production scanning to the mid-volume segment and sets completely new standards. As the “little sibling” of the throughput sensation SCAMAX® 6x1, it combines the 24/7 operation capability and numerous premium functionalities of the world’s leading desktop production scanner into an even more compact device with favorable conditions. This allows your institution to handle even comparatively small daily volumes with the quality and reliability of a high-end production scanner, without using a sledgehammer to crack a nut. Optimized in terms of price and performance for daily throughputs ranging from three-digit to ﬁve-digit ﬁgures, the SCAMAX® 3x1 is the highest quality and most cost-effective choice whenever excellent results, intuitive usability and long product life are the key selection criteria.

Call it the “middleweight champ”, the new standard in the mid-volume class or a class of its own... We call it an InoTec production scanner. Made in Germany.

Name: Avision AD5800N
Short description:
• A3 Document Size
  • 2 sec
  • Daily Throughput: 1,000 sheets
  • USB
Description: Avision is pleased to announce its  release of the high-volume document scanner with a robust 100-page auto document feeder and a blazing scanning speed of up to 80 pages per minute in color, grayscale, and monochrome. Combining the ultrasonic double-feed  detection capability, the AD5800N delivers exceptional feeding reliability to maximize your scanning productivity in a small unit.
Meta: features_text:
A Fast & High – Volume Document Scanner

Avision is pleased to announce its  release of the high-volume document scanner with a robust 100-page auto document feeder and a blazing scanning speed of up to 80 pages per minute in color, grayscale, and monochrome. Combining the ultrasonic double-feed  detection capability, the AD5800N delivers exceptional feeding reliability to maximize your scanning productivity in a small unit.

Long Document Scanning

The AD5800N provides you a convenient feature to scan long-page document up to 240″(609.6 cm). This is a cost and time-saving solution for insurance company and healthcare institutions that need to digitize insurance bill and patient’s record.

A LED Display

The AD5800N is easy to use through the clear 1.77″LCD display. By selecting your destination and pressing the “Scan” button, the scan can be done and the scanned image can be sent to your specified destination application such as e-mail, printer, or your favorable image-editing software application. Up to nine frequently used scan settings destinations can be preset for different scanning needs.

Two Reading Heads Save Twice Working Time

Featuring two reading heads, the product is able to achieve two-side (front and read side) scanning in one scan, meaning the page does not need to pass through the feeder twice to save your working time.

Scan to Clouds via Button Manager V2

With the bundled software – Button Manager V2, you can scan and send the images to popular cloud servers including Google Drive, Evernote, Dropbox, and SharePoint to share your documents fast and easily.

Complete bundled software applications

The AD5800N comes with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and are bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager V2, AvScan , and PaperPort . With Button Manager V2, you can scan to searchable PDF, JPEG, BMP, or GIF file format, save to folder on your computer, and scan to e-mail, image editing application, or a cloud application such as Google Docs or Microsoft SharePoint with a press of a button. The AVScan and PaperPort are highly effective image processing and document management software that helps you streamline your task more efficiently.

A network document scanner

With a network port at the back side, the AD5800N allows you to use it as a network scanner. This means users in the intranet environment can share the scanner and obtain the scanned image from their individual computer.

Features

  • Fast, 80ppm / 160 ipm scanning in color, grayscale and monochrome (300dpi)
  • Support document up to A3 size (297 x 432 mm)
  • Robust 100-page automatic document feeder
  • Daily duty cycle of up to 15,000 sheet
  • Auto crop and deskew a document with the advanced image processing unit to enhance the scanning speed
  • Press and scan to cloud servers via the bundled software Button Manager
  • Earth-friendly LED technology
  • Long page scanning up to 6096mm(240″)

Certification mark

Name: Image Access WideTEK 12-650
Short description:
• Flatbed Color Document Scanner
  • Up to 1200 x 1200 dpi Optical Resolution
  • Scans A3+ documents in under 3 seconds
  • Designed for fragile originals, books, and bound materials
Description:
• Flatbed Color Document Scanner
  • Up to 1200 x 1200 dpi Optical Resolution
  • Scans A3+ documents in under 3 seconds
  • Designed for fragile originals, books, and bound materials
Meta: features_text:
Lightning-fast performance

The WideTEK 12-650 is available for applications where A3+ is large enough but fast scanning speed and high optical resolution is required. The scanner needs less than three seconds to scan the largest format of 12.3 x 18.5 inches in normal mode at 300dpi and only 12 seconds in 3D mode at 600dpi, twice as fast as the closest competition.

3D surface scanning

Discover unmatched surface inspection and quality control with the 3D imaging capabilities of our flatbed scanners. Whether examining coins, Braille prints, or SMD components on electronic boards, our WideTEK flatbed scanners capture every detail with exceptional precision.

Borderless glatt plate

The scanner’s scratch resistant, non-reflective glass plate has been expanded to reach the edges of the flatbed scanner, making it 100% protective of the documents laid on it. No more bent or folded edges on your source documents.

Compact and accessible

The scanner’s footprint is so small that it can be placed on any desktop or workstation. Installation is so simple, you will be scanning within minutes after taking it out of the box. Easy, fast and affordable.

Optional backlight unit

Boost your scanner's versatility with the BACKLIGHT option, enabling high-quality scanning  of transparent material like X-rays, glass negatives, 35mm microfilm aperture cards, cutout stencils, sepias, and film.

Powerful software

Achieve exceptional scanning results with advanced features like automatic crop and deskew, as well as virtual rescan. Depending on the device type, options like finger and thumb removal, automatic width detection, or 3D scanning for authentic digitization of textured surfaces are also available. Our software further supports seamless copying and archiving, allowing you to send documents to various destinations, including SMB, FTP, printers, email, and cloud storage.

No compromises on security

All Image Access Scanners are based on a Linux operating system, which is extremely secure and virus-resistant. Nevertheless, the device is easy and intuitive to use and, when operated over the network, fits seamlessly into any Windows work environment.

• Large-Format Flatbed Color Scanner

Meta: features_text:
Superior multispectral scanning

The WideTEK 12 SPECTRUM delivers high-speed, precise imaging, making it a reliable alternative to many higher-priced lab instruments. This advanced backlight scanner captures images in UV, visible light, and IR, providing exceptional detail and clarity across all spectrums, and accommodating formats up to DIN A3+ (12 x 18 inches). Its advanced technology ensures high-quality scans, making it ideal for various professional applications.

Discover the unseen

The scanner’s UV light at 365nm captures fluorescent emissions, while IR light at 850nm reveals infrared contrast. Visible light (VIS) ensures the highest color accuracy, with the 3D light mode capturing the surface structure of objects, and the backlight mode excelling in capturing VIS transmission, revealing intricate details of semitransparent objects.

Authenticity verification

Designed for high-security applications, this scanner excels in verifying the authenticity of banknotes, passports, ID cards, and certificates. Its backlight feature in the lid detects watermarks and other semitransparent security elements with ease.

3D surface scanning

Experience unparalleled surface inspection and quality control with the scanner’s 3D imaging capabilities. Whether inspecting Braille prints or SMD parts on electronic boards, the WideTEK 12 SPECTRUM ensures every detail is captured with precision.

Lightning-fast imaging

Achieve rapid and efficient scanning with the WideTEK 12 SPECTRUM. It delivers full-color or IR scans of the entire area at 300dpi in just 3 seconds. High-resolution scans at 1200dpi are completed within 12 seconds.

Versatile applications

The WideTEK 12 SPECTRUM stands out as the most versatile multispectral and multidirection light scanner in the industry. Its image accuracy is perfect for industrial quality inspections and forgery detection across various government and industrial applications. Experience the pinnacle of scanning technology, ensuring precision and reliability in every scan.

Powerful software

Achieve exceptional scanning results with advanced features like automatic crop and deskew, as well as virtual rescan. Depending on the device type, options like finger and thumb removal, automatic width detection, or 3D scanning for authentic digitization of textured surfaces are also available. Our software further supports seamless copying and archiving, allowing you to send documents to various destinations, including SMB, FTP, printers, email, and cloud storage.

No compromises on security

All Image Access Scanners are based on a Linux operating system, which is extremely secure and virus-resistant. Nevertheless, the device is easy and intuitive to use and, when operated over the network, fits seamlessly into any Windows work environment.

Robust glass plate

The WideTEK 36F features a robust glass plate that is both scratch-resistant and easy to clean. This durable surface effectively protects the scanner from dirt, dust, wet ink, paint, and other contaminants, ensuring consistent performance and longevity.

Flexible operation

3D surface scanning

Short description:
• Wide-Format CCD Color Scanner (60")
  • Up to 600 x 600 dpi Optical Resolution

Description:
• Wide-Format CCD Color Scanner (60")

Meta: features_text:
High-performance scanning

The WideTEK 60CL is a cost-effective solution for wide format scanning up to 60 inches (1570 mm) in width, with an adjustable document thickness of up to 0.5 inches (12 mm). Featuring the fastest high-quality CIS camera system, it delivers excellent performance and reliability. Designed for productivity and affordability, this scanner is ideal for high-demand scanning environments.

Gentle document handling

Our wide format scanners excels in handling delicate documents with care. Specialized transport rollers apply minimal pressure, ensuring safe passage for fragile materials. Automatic document size recognition allows flexible feeding, while cropping and deskewing adjust for perfect image alignment. Dust-protected and encapsulated optical components ensure long-term reliability and performance.

Walk-up scanning with integrated PC

Walk-up scanning is made simple and efficient, with access available through the scanner’s intuitive touchscreen or via mobile devices. This flexible setup allows users to start scanning quickly, with no need for additional computers or complicated setups.

Direct connection to wide format printers

The scanner connects directly to wide format printers from Canon, HP, and Epson. Integrated printer drivers ensure seamless communication, providing full feature compatibility with all major wide format printers. This integration enhances your workflow by allowing easy printing directly from the scanner, ensuring efficient and smooth operation across your devices.

Virtual rescan

You can easily modify scanned images without the need to rescan, allowing you to adjust essential settings like color mode, brightness, contrast, and other parameters. Additionally, you can rotate, crop, and mirror images after scanning, offering even more flexibility to achieve the desired output.

Powerful software

Achieve exceptional scanning results with advanced features like automatic crop and deskew, as well as virtual rescan. Depending on the device type, options like finger and thumb removal, automatic width detection, or 3D scanning for authentic digitization of textured surfaces are also available. Our software further supports seamless copying and archiving, allowing you to send documents to various destinations, including SMB, FTP, printers, email, and cloud storage.

No compromises on security

Short description:
• Overhead A2+ Book Scanner

Description:
• Overhead A2+ Book Scanner

Meta: features_text:
Versatility meets efficiency

The BookTEK 5 V2 Archive is our most versatile book scanner, designed to meet the demanding needs of archives and libraries. Its self-adjusting book cradle seamlessly adapts to both V-shaped and flat scanning modes, ensuring gentle yet precise digitization of bound materials. Paired with matching glass plates for optimal image quality, it delivers exceptional results while preserving the integrity of delicate or historical documents. Perfect for high-volume digitization projects where accuracy and efficiency are key, even in 24/7 operation.

Productivity in brilliant quality

Using the latest camera technology from Image Access, this scanner meets FADGI, Metamorfoze, and ISO 19264 specifications. Yet, it delivers remarkable speed, capturing A2+ documents in under a second and completing 600 dpi scans in just three seconds.

Advanced book cradle design

The self-adjusting book cradle ensures high-quality scans while safeguarding delicate bindings. For maximum protection, fragile books can be scanned in V-mode. Depending on the needs, the BookTEK 5 V2 Archive can be used with a V-shaped glass plate, a flat glass plate, or without a glass plate at all.

Software solutions for production scanning

A high-performance production scanner relies on robust capture software. Image Access offers powerful software solutions for the BookTEK 5 V2 Archive, designed to streamline and optimize high-volume digitization projects.

Ergonomic and flexible

The BookTEK 5 V2 Archive is equipped with a 21-inch Full HD multitouch screen for an intuitive user experience. Centrally positioned control buttons ensure a symmetrical and ergonomic operation, making scanning more comfortable and efficient.

Powerful software

Achieve exceptional scanning results with advanced features like automatic crop and deskew, as well as virtual rescan. Depending on the device type, options like finger and thumb removal, automatic width detection, or 3D scanning for authentic digitization of textured surfaces are also available. Our software further supports seamless copying and archiving, allowing you to send documents to various destinations, including SMB, FTP, printers, email, and cloud storage.

No compromises on security

All Image Access Scanners are based on a Linux operating system, which is extremely secure and virus-resistant. Nevertheless, the device is easy and intuitive to use and, when operated over the network, fits seamlessly into any Windows work environment.

Motorized glass plate

Name: Image Access WideTEK 60ART-600
Short description:
• Wide-Format Art Scanner (60")
  • Up to 600 x 600 dpi Optical Resolution
  • Captures fine art, oil paintings, and textured surfaces in ultra-high detail
  • Designed for museums, galleries, and art reproduction professionals
Description:
• Wide-Format Art Scanner (60")
  • Up to 600 x 600 dpi Optical Resolution
  • Captures fine art, oil paintings, and textured surfaces in ultra-high detail
  • Designed for museums, galleries, and art reproduction professionals
Meta: features_text:
Perfecting the art of art scanning

Available in a 48-inch and a 60-inch version, the WideTEK ART sets a new standard for scanning fine art, capturing exceptional detail and color accuracy. From oil and acrylic paintings to watercolors, charcoal sketches, pastel drawings, mixed media collages, and antique pieces, it handles artworks up to 60 x 80 inches (1524 x 2032 mm) and 5.5 inches (140mm) in height, delivering stunning results at 1200 dpi.

Unveiling texture

The WideTEK ART excels in capturing surface textures through advanced 3D scanning. Whether emphasizing subtle textures or enhancing pronounced features, it provides adjustable settings to perfectly showcase the intricate details of artworks. This capability ensures that every scan captures the essence and depth of the original piece, making it an invaluable tool for art preservation and reproduction.

Contactless digitization

Original artwork is scanned without any physical contact, as the CCD camera system captures the image while the artwork is gently moved below it. This process eliminates the risk of damage, making it possible to digitize even framed pieces or freshly painted works without compromising their condition.

Professional art reproduction

The WideTEK ART integrates effortlessly with large-format printers from HP, Canon, and EPSON, delivering a complete solution for professional art reproduction. With native printer drivers installed directly on the scanner, it ensures exceptional color accuracy for stunning, true-to-original results.

3D surface scanning

Beyond capturing fine art textures, our WideTEK ART stands out in 3D surface scanning for a variety of uses. From inspecting coins, Braille prints, and textiles to analyzing SMD components on circuit boards, this scanner delivers precise imaging for detailed surface inspection and quality control.

Two versions, upgradable from 48" to 60"

The scanner is available in two versions: the 60-inch version and a more cost-effective 48-inch version for users with smaller format needs up to 48 x 80 inches (1270 x 2032mm). For maximum flexibility, the WideTEK 48ART can be seamlessly upgraded to the full 60-inch width at any time with an upgrade key, ensuring your scanner adapts to your evolving requirements.

Rapid data transfer

The 1 Gbit Fast Ethernet connection with TCP/IP-based Scan2Net® interface provides ultra-fast data transfer speeds. Scanned images move across your network nearly instantaneously, ensuring efficient workflow.

Powerful software

Achieve exceptional scanning results with advanced features like automatic crop and deskew, as well as virtual rescan. Depending on the device type, options like finger and thumb removal, automatic width detection, or 3D scanning for authentic digitization of textured surfaces are also available. Our software further supports seamless copying and archiving, allowing you to send documents to various destinations, including SMB, FTP, printers, email, and cloud storage.

No compromises on security

All Image Access Scanners are based on a Linux operating system, which is extremely secure and virus-resistant. Nevertheless, the device is easy and intuitive to use and, when operated over the network, fits seamlessly into any Windows work environment.

Name: Ricoh ScanSnap iX2500
Short description:
• 45ppm & 100-sheet ADF with advanced brake-roller separation
  • Designed for up to 4,000 scans daily for business-class productivity
  • Ultrasonic feed detection ensures jam-free, damage-free operation
  • Intuitive U-turn paper path with touchscreen-driven workflows
  • Lightweight and compact at just 3.5kg — perfect for any desk
Description:
• 45ppm & 100-sheet ADF with advanced brake-roller separation
  • Designed for up to 4,000 scans daily for business-class productivity
  • Ultrasonic feed detection ensures jam-free, damage-free operation
  • Intuitive U-turn paper path with touchscreen-driven workflows
  • Lightweight and compact at just 3.5kg — perfect for any desk
Meta: consumbles_1_con_description:
100 ml bottle
For use on the Brake roller and Pick roller
Meta: features_text:
Our flagship model scans more documents faster and offers greater connectivity for easier access to shared data from anywhere

ScanSnap iX2500 is the evolved flagship model of the ScanSnap series, enabling scanning at higher speeds of 45 ppm/90 ipm (A4-size documents, color, 300 dpi). It comes with a large 5-inch touch screen to bridge the gap where the physical and digital meet. The device allows you to use your personalized settings anywhere, regardless of whether you are at home, the office, or a rental coworking space. It integrates seamlessly with digital services for utilizing scanned data and offers a user-friendly, stress-free experience.
  • Intuitive 5-inch touch screen and smartphone-like usability
  • Wi-Fi (2.4 / 5GHz*1) compatibility
  • Secure connections with Wi-Fi 6/WPA3 support
  • Speedy scans up to 45 ppm/90 ipm (A4-size documents, color, 300dpi)
  • 100 sheets Automatic Document Feeder (ADF)
  • For both individual and team use
  • Balances high-speed scanning and fast startup with energy efficiency
  • Your usual settings and cloud save destinations are applied to the scanner
  • Data Sync*2: Transcending device boundaries
  • Save directly to a network folder*3 and cloud services, or send to email without the need for a PC
  • Seamless integration with various digital services
  • Environmentally conscious product design and packaging materials
  • *1 Availability of 5 GHz Wi-Fi may vary depending on region.
  • *2 Data Sync will be available in a later update.
  • *3 Scanning to a network folder will be available in the late 2025 update.
 

Whether in the office, at home, or in a coworking space, instantly apply your personal scan settings to enjoy smooth scanning

The large 5-inch touch screen with improved response allows you to view scan profiles created on your PC or smartphone as visual icons, such as saving destinations to PC folders or cloud services linked with ScanSnap Cloud. Furthermore, detailed scan settings, such as file format, color, image quality, and two-page stitching, can be configured on the touch screen, enabling the intuitive operation of the scanner.
 

Your usual settings and cloud save destinations are applied to the scanner

Use the ScanSnap iX2500 on any office floor or a rental coworking space with your own settings and save destinations! By connecting a device to the ScanSnap iX2500, your usual settings and cloud save destinations are applied to the scanner, allowing any ScanSnap iX2500 to function as your personal scanner. In addition, you can temporarily apply your usual settings to the ScanSnap iX2500 by bringing your smartphone close to it.* Instantly access your usual settings with just a smartphone. Convenient but secure short-term use is available for a shared environment.  
  • * This function will be available in a later update.
 

Intuitive user interface ideal for teams, families, and shared use

You can easily switch users on the touch screen to display your settings and icons, allowing you to scan without hesitation, even for shared use.

Seamless integration with various digital services*1

ScanSnap Home for PC has a revamped Quick Menu, which allows you to select saving and integration destinations after scanning. In addition to traditional options like folder saving and email sending, new integrations with Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneNote, Notion, and iCloud have been added.*2 For Microsoft Teams, OneNote, SharePoint, and Notion, the target applications' windows are opened, making data sharing a breeze. Moreover, various cloud services linked to the ScanSnap Cloud service*3 that would enable direct saving to the cloud are also suggested on the Quick Menu.
  • *1 Services differ by region.
  • *2 Need to install these applications on the user's PC to use the function.
  • *3 For countries where this service is available, please visit here.

Stress-free usability on a PC, smartphone, or PC-free

With a new scan engine and the next-generation iiGA SoC, the ScanSnap iX2500 offers a stress-free and comfortable user experience.

Comfortable scanning with ultra high speed performance and large capacity

Scans A4 color duplex documents at 45 pages per minute and 90 images per minute for stable, high-speed scanning on PCs, as well as smartphones, and tablets. The maximum ADF capacity is 100, and even when the Receipt Guide is installed, 50 A4 sheets can be loaded, making it easy to scan large volumes of documents.

Wi-Fi connectivity for both smartphones and PCs

The ScanSnap iX2500 supports Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands) and enables wireless saving to smart devices and the cloud without needing a PC. With Wi-Fi 6 (IEEE 802.11ax) compatibility, the scanner ensures robust and stable communication, even in environments with radio interference and congestion. Additionally, it supports the WPA3 security protocol and TLS 1.3, safeguarding your valuable information.
 

Save directly to a network folder* and cloud services, or send to email without the need for a PC

Save scanned data directly to network-attached storage (NAS) and to cloud services ScanSnap Cloud supports without a PC via touch screen operation. Scanned data can also be sent via email using the icon (profile) to which a destination email address has been assigned in advance.
  • * Scanning to a network folder will be available in the late 2025 update.

Environmentally conscious product design and packaging materials

Less plastic waste

Recycled plastic is over 25% of the main unit's resin weight. We also use recycled plastics* and pulp molds for packaging and cushioning materials when transporting products, achieving zero use of virgin plastics derived from fossil resources. These contribute to reducing plastic waste.
  • * Pre-consumer materials, which have not been used by consumers and are generated during the manufacturing and molding processes, are used.

Energy-saving features minimize the environmental impact

Industry-leading energy-saving performance with a power consumption of 17 W during operation, 1.0 W during sleep mode with USB connection. In addition, after ten minutes of inactivity of the scanner, the scanner automatically enters sleep mode, reducing unnecessary power consumption. Please refer to RICOH Image Scanners Environment for more information on our eco-friendly initiatives in our scanner products.

Name: AD3100FWN
Short description:
• A4 Document Size
  • Daily Throughout: 1000 sheets
  • USB
Description: A New Generation of Document Scanner Enhanced with innovative features, the Avision AD3100WN offer high throughput of 100 ppm and 200 ipm in a compact footprint conserving both space and budget. Unlike common sheet-fed scanners which provide only the auto document feeder and can not accommodate irregular sizes and weights of paper, the AD3100FWN Series harmoniously combines the benefits of the fast scan rate of the ADF and the convenience of the flatbed unit to meet customer’s diverse requirements.
Meta: features_text:
Product Details

▍Built-In Advanced Image Processor

Embedded with Avision-developed image processor, the scanned image can be automatically cropped, straightened, and optimized with enhanced speed.

▍A network document scanner

With the network port at the back side, the AD3100FWN allows you to use it as a network scanner. This means users in the intranet environment can share the scanner and obtain the scanned image from their individual computer. What is best, the network scanner allows you to switch to other computers in the LAN, users in the LAN can really enjoy the scan and collect the image from their own computers!

▍Mobile scanning via Wi-Fi connection

Built-in with a Wi-Fi dongle, the AD3100FWN can work as a wireless device to scan and receive images directly from your mobile devices through Avision’s App.

▍Support form document up to 242 x 356 mm (9.5 x 14 in.)

The AD3100FWN boast unique and innovative design in comparison with its predecessors – the ability to accommodate form document up to 242 x 356 mm (9.5 x 14 in.). The extended document width from standard 216 mm (8.5 in.) to 242 mm (9.5 in.) makes the AD3100FWN more competitive to fit for a wider range of documents.

▍Reverse Roller Enhances Feeding Reliability

Designed with the innovative reverse roller for advanced paper separation capability, the AD380F Series delivers outstanding feeding reliability and operating productivity by effectively reducing the risk of a multi-feed or paper jam.

▍Paper Protection Technology

The advanced Paper protection technology protects valuable paper from being wrinkled or torn by halting the scan process once a skewed page is detected.

▍A Duplex Scanner Suited for Document and Cards

Thanks to the advanced straight paper path and image processing technology, mixed batches of documents with varies sizes and weights can be scanned, appropriately cropped, deskewed, and ready to use. Scan size accepts paper from receipts 50 x 50 mm (2 x 2 in.) to business document 242 x 356 mm (9.5 x 14 in.). The auto document feeder is also robust enough to feed paper up to 400 g/m2 (110 lbs) and embossed hard cards such as ID cards, credit cards, driver’s license, and health insurance card up to 1.25 mm thick.

▍Automatic multiple images cropping

In addition, the scanner comes with the convenient feature of multiple images cropping. With this feature, various sizes of documents such as photos, ID Cards, or business cards can be placed on the flatbed and the scanner is able to crop and create multiple images according to the original sizes of the documents in one single scan.

▍Earth-Friendly LED Technology

The AD3100FWN deliver high throughput and outstanding performance. However, it is earth-friendly at the same time. The LED technology requires no warm up time and is lower power consumption without generating mercury vapor as other traditional scanners using the CCFL (cold cathode fluorescent lamp) technology.

▍High-Volume Daily Duty Cycle

The scanner can be used to scan up to 15,000 pages per day through the 100-page automatic document feeder. The data indicates that this scanner is designed to scan document in any application requiring frequent document and hard card scanning.

▍Powerful bundled software applications

The AD3100FWN come with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and are bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager , AVScan , and PaperPort . With Button Manager , you can scan to searchable PDF, JPEG, BMP, or GIF file format, save to folder on your computer, and scan to e-mail, image editing application, or even a cloud application such as Google Drive, or Microsoft SharePoint with a press of a button. The AVScan and PaperPort are highly effective image processing and document management software that helps you streamline your task more efficiently.

▍Features

  • Fast scan rate up to 100 pages per minute and 200 images per minute at 300 dpi in gray, or B&W mode
  • Auto crop and deskew a document with the advanced Avision-developed image processing unit to enhance the scanning speed
  • 100-page auto document feeder (80 g/m2)
  • Reverse roller technology delivers outstanding feeding reliability
  • USB 3.1 for high speed transmission
  • Ultrasonic multi-feed detection
  • Earth-friendly LED technology
  • Compact auto document feeder holds documents up to 100 pages
  • Easy-to-use button scanning
  • Supports 240” (6000 mm, 200 dpi, color duplex ) long page scanning
  • Auto power off setting
 

▎Certification mark

▎Instruction

Icon / LED User Check 1. Check if the scanner has been connected to a computer via a USB cable. AD200/300 series scanner AD6000/8000 series scanner 2. Check if the scanner driver has been installed. 3. Or you may check if the right driver has been successfully installed by choosing Device Manager>Image Device from the Control Panel. 4. Or else try to replace another USB cable.

▎Software

Others: Virtual Scanner Link Does Not Find Your Scanner. User Check 1. Check if the scanner mode supprot network function and had an IP address. If your scanner is located in difference network segment, add the IP manually on the Virtual Scanner Link. For example, if the IP of your PC is 10.1.20.xxx and the IP of your scanner is 10.1.30.xxx, then you need to add the scanner’s IP manually.

▎Hardware Related

Error Code 3003: DRAM R/W Test Error. Icon User Check 1. Turn your scanner off and on. 2. If the problem still happen, please kindly check the serial number on your scanner label first, then click the following "Ask to help" option to full the form then feedback to us, thanks. Error Code 2024: NVRAM R/W Test Error. Icon User Check 1. Turn your scanner off and on. 2. If the problem still happen, please kindly check the serial number on your scanner label first, then click the following "Ask to help" option to full the form then feedback to us, thanks.

▍Reverse Roller Enhances Feeding Reliability

Designed with the innovative reverse roller for advanced paper separation capability, the AD380F Series delivers outstanding feeding reliability and operating productivity by effectively reducing the risk of a multi-feed or paper jam.

▍Paper Protection Technology

The advanced Paper protection technology protects valuable paper from being wrinkled or torn by halting the scan process once a skewed page is detected.

▍A Duplex Scanner Suited for Document and Cards

Thanks to the advanced straight paper path and image processing technology, mixed batches of documents with varies sizes and weights can be scanned, appropriately cropped, deskewed, and ready to use. Scan size accepts paper from receipts 50 x 50 mm (2 x 2 in.) to business document 242 x 356 mm (9.5 x 14 in.). The auto document feeder is also robust enough to feed paper up to 400 g/m2 (110 lbs) and embossed hard cards such as ID cards, credit cards, driver’s license, and health insurance card up to 1.25 mm thick.

▍Automatic multiple images cropping

In addition, the scanner comes with the convenient feature of multiple images cropping. With this feature, various sizes of documents such as photos, ID Cards, or business cards can be placed on the flatbed and the scanner is able to crop and create multiple images according to the original sizes of the documents in one single scan.

▍Earth-Friendly LED Technology

The AD3100F deliver high throughput and outstanding performance. However, it is earth-friendly at the same time. The LED technology requires no warm up time and is lower power consumption without generating mercury vapor as other traditional scanners using the CCFL (cold cathode fluorescent lamp) technology.

▍High-Volume Daily Duty Cycle

The scanner can be used to scan up to 15,000 pages per day through the 100-page automatic document feeder. The data indicates that this scanner is designed to scan document in any application requiring frequent document and hard card scanning.

▍Powerful bundled software applications

The AD3100F come with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and are bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager , AVScan , and PaperPort . With Button Manager , you can scan to searchable PDF, JPEG, BMP, or GIF file format, save to folder on your computer, and scan to e-mail, image editing application, or even a cloud application such as Google Drive, or Microsoft SharePoint with a press of a button. The AVScan and PaperPort are highly effective image processing and document management software that helps you streamline your task more efficiently.

▍Features

  • Fast scan rate up to 100 pages per minute and 200 images per minute at 300 dpi in gray, or B&W mode
  • Auto crop and deskew a document with the advanced Avision-developed image processing unit to enhance the scanning speed
  • 100-page auto document feeder (80 g/m2)
  • Reverse roller technology delivers outstanding feeding reliability
  • USB 3.1 for high speed transmission
  • Ultrasonic multi-feed detection
  • Earth-friendly LED technology
  • Compact auto document feeder holds documents up to 100 pages
  • Easy-to-use button scanning
  • Supports 240” (6000 mm, 200 dpi, color duplex ) long page scanning
  • Auto power off setting
 

▎Certification mark

▎Instruction

Icon / LED User Check 1. Check if the scanner has been connected to a computer via a USB cable. AD200/300 series scanner AD6000/8000 series scanner 2. Check if the scanner driver has been installed. 3. Or you may check if the right driver has been successfully installed by choosing Device Manager>Image Device from the Control Panel. 4. Or else try to replace another USB cable.

▎Software

Others: Virtual Scanner Link Does Not Find Your Scanner. User Check 1. Check if the scanner mode supprot network function and had an IP address. If your scanner is located in difference network segment, add the IP manually on the Virtual Scanner Link. For example, if the IP of your PC is 10.1.20.xxx and the IP of your scanner is 10.1.30.xxx, then you need to add the scanner’s IP manually.

▎Hardware Related

Name: AD3100N
Short description:
• A4 Document Size
  • Daily Throughout: 1000 sheets
  • USB
Description:
AD3100N Fast, and Affordable Sheet-Fed Scanner

The fast, compact and intuitive AD3100N sheet-fed scanners from Avision offer unrivaled performance and market-leading document imaging capabilities. Even with the compact size, this new series of scanner can scan A4 portrait documents at a speed of 100 ppm/200 ipm, and can load up to 100 sheets at a time, scanning up to 15,000 sheets per day.
Meta: features_text:
Product Details

▍Built-In Advanced Image Processor

Embedded with Avision-developed image processor , the scanned image can be automatically cropped, straightened, and optimized with enhanced speed.

▍Ensure Stable Feeding Ability with the Advanced Paper Handling Design

The advanced paperweight and feeding rollers are designed to ensure reliable paper feeding at the maximum capacity even with thin paper in various environmental conditions (very high or low temperature and humidity).

▍Color, and Graphical LCD Display

The AD3100N are easy to use through the LCD display and buttons on the panel. By selecting your destination and pressing the “Scan” button, the scan can be done and the scanned image can be sent to your specified destination application such as e-mail, printer, or your favorable image-editing software application. Up to nine frequently used scan settings and destinations can be preset for different scanning needs.  		  
 

▍Duplex Scanners Suited for Document and Cards

Thanks to the advanced straight paper path and image processing technology, mixed batches of documents with varies sizes and weights can be scanned, appropriately cropped, deskewed, and ready to use. Scan size accepts paper from receipts (2” x 2”) to business document (8.5 x 14 in.). The auto document feeder is also robust enough to feed paper up to 413 g/m2 (110 lbs) and embossed hard cards such as ID cards, credit cards, driver’s license, and health insurance card up to 1.25mm in thickness.

▍Reverse Roller Enhances Feeding Reliability

Designed with the innovative reverse roller for advanced paper separation capability, the AD3100N deliver outstanding feeding reliability and operating productivity by effectively reducing the risk of a multi-feed or paper jam.  		  
 

▍Ultrasonic Multi-Feed Detection

With the ultrasonic multi-feed detection capability, the scanner allows you to set overlapped paper by detecting paper thickness between documents. The ultrasonic function can be turned off when scanning document with labels, sticky notes, or taped receipts. This innovative design prevents double feeding and effectively scans documents of different weights or thickness.  

▍Compact Design to Save Your Space

The AD3100N feature a unique and stylish design as both the input and output paper tray can be folded when not in use. The paper tray also helps to protect the unit from dust. Unlike bulky conventional scanners, the slim AD3100N can be easily carried and fit on a desk without taking up a lot of space.  		  

▍Powerful Bundled Software Applications

The AD3100N come with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and are bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager, AVScan , and PaperPort. With Button Manager, you can create searchable PDFs, scan and send images to e-mail, printer, or clouds servers such as Google DriveTM, or Evernote® with just a simple press of a button. The AVScan andPaperPort are highly effective image processing and document management software that helps you streamline your task more efficiently.
 

▍Features

  • Fast, 100ppm/200ipm scanning in color, grayscale and monochrome
  • Auto crop and deskew a document with the advanced Avision-developed image processing unit to enhance the scanning speed
  • Support form paper up to 8.5 x 14 in.
  • Daily duty cycle up to 15,000 sheets
  • Robust 100-page automatic document feeder (80 g/m2, 20 lb)
  • Reverse roller technology delivers outstanding feeding reliability
  • Hard and embossed card scanning up to 1.25 mm in thickness in portrait or landscape feeding
  • Press and scan to cloud servers via the bundled software Button Manager
  • Earth-friendly LED technology
  • Long page scanning: 5540 mm (218”) (300 dpi, duplex)/6000 mm (240”) (<200 dpi)
  • Auto power off setting
 

▎Certification mark

▎Instruction

Icon / LED User Check 1. Check if the scanner has been connected to a computer via a USB cable. AD200/300 series scanner AD6000/8000 series scanner 2. Check if the scanner driver has been installed. 3. Or you may check if the right driver has been successfully installed by choosing Device Manager>Image Device from the Control Panel. 4. Or else try to replace another USB cable.

▎Software

Others: Virtual Scanner Link Does Not Find Your Scanner. User Check 1. Check if the scanner mode supprot network function and had an IP address. If your scanner is located in difference network segment, add the IP manually on the Virtual Scanner Link. For example, if the IP of your PC is 10.1.20.xxx and the IP of your scanner is 10.1.30.xxx, then you need to add the scanner’s IP manually.

Name: AD8130U
Short description:
• A3 Document Size
  • Recommended Daily Volume: Up to 100,000 pages
  • USB3.2 Gen1x1
Description:
AD8130U A Duplex High-Volume Production Scanner

Avision is pleased to announce its release of the high-volume production scanner with a robust 600-page auto document feeder and a blazing scanning speed of up to 130 ppm/260 ipm in Color, Grayscale, and Monochrome. Combining paper protection technology and triple ultrasonic double-feed detection capability, the AD8130U delivers exceptional feeding reliability to maximize your scanning productivity in a small unit.
Meta: features_text:
Product Details

   

▍Effective network Scanning

With the network port at the back side, the AD8130U allows you to use it as a network scanner.  This means users in the intranet environment can share the scanner and obtain the scanned image from their individual computer.

▍High-Volume Daily Duty Cycle

The scanner can be used to scan up to 100,000 pages per day through the 600-page automatic document feeder. The data indicates that this scanner is designed to scan document in any application requiring frequent document and hard card scanning.

▍Dual CIS Design to Handle Wrinkled Documents

Designed to handle even extreme applications, the AD8130U scanner is built-in with two CIS. These CIS give you maximum illumination to help eliminate shadows from wrinkled documents.

▍Triple Ultrasonic Sensors to Detect Overlapped Paper

Three ultrasonic sensors provide protection against double feeds by detecting and preventing overlapping pages from being fed into the scanner at the same time. Each sensor can be set to ignore or detect specified areas of a document to accommodate pages with labels or attachments.

▍Staple Detection Technology

Avision’s Staple Detection feature automatically stops the scanning process when an unremoved staple is detected. If left undetected, staples could cause errors that compromise the document, cause jams, or damage the device.

▍Plastic card or ID card uses the straight paper path

To provide scanner users with the most versatile scanning environments, the user has the choice to utilize a “Curved or Straight Paper Path”.  By opening the rear cover, users can use the straight path to transport paper to the rear of the unit. To utilize the straight paper path ensures high reliability with plastic card, ID card, thick, long paper, or more fragile documents.

▍A Large LCD Display

The AD8130U is easy to use through the clear 1.8” LCD display. By selecting your destination and pressing the “Scan” button, the scan can be done and the scanned image can be sent to your specified destination application such as e-mail, printer, or your favorable image-editing software application. Up to nine frequently used scan settings and destinations can be preset for different scanning needs.

▍Scan to Cloud with Button Manager

The AD8130U come with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and are bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager , AVScan , and PaperPort . With Button Manager , you can complete a scan and send the image directly to cloud servers such as Google Drive, Dropbox, Evernote, FaceBook, or Microsoft SharePoint with a press of a button. You can also save the image to searchable PDF, JPEG, BMP, or GIF file format, and scan to e-mail, or image editing application. In addition, the bundled software applications also include AVScan  and PaperPort which are are highly effective document management software to streamline your task more efficiently.  

▍Features

  • Fast, 130 ppm / 260 ipm scanning in color, grayscale and monochrome  ( 200 / 300 dpi )
  • Support form document up to 297 x 432 mm (A3)
  • Robust 600-page  automatic document feeder
  • Daily duty cycle of up to 100,000 sheets
  • Three Ultrasonic sensors to enable or disable detection in different areas of  document
  • Staple detection feature
  • Curved or Straight Paper Path
  • Auto crop and deskew a document with the advanced image processing unit  to enhance the scanning speed
  • Latest USB 3.2 Gen1x1 connectivity for faster transmission speed
  • Reverse roller technology delivers outstanding feeding reliability
  • Hard and embossed card scanning up to 1.25 mm in thickness in landscape  feeding
  • Press and scan to cloud servers via the bundled software Button Manager
  • Earth-friendly LED technology
  • Long page scanning up to 6096 mm (240”)
  • Auto power off setting
   

▎Certification mark

Avision is pleased to announce its release of the high-volume production scanner with a robust 600-page auto document feeder and a blazing scanning speed of up to 150 ppm/300 ipm in Color, Grayscale, and Monochrome. Combining paper protection technology and triple ultrasonic double-feed detection capability, the AD8130zNP delivers exceptional feeding reliability to maximize your scanning productivity in a small unit.
Meta: features_text:
Product Details

   

▍High-Volume Daily Duty Cycle

The scanner can be used to scan up to 100,000 pages per day through the 600-page  automatic document feeder. The data indicates that this scanner is designed to scan document in any application requiring frequent document and hard card scanning.

▍Dual CIS Design to Handle Wrinkled Documents

Designed to handle even extreme applications, the AD8130zNP scanner is built-in with two CIS. These CIS give you maximum illumination to help eliminate shadows from wrinkled documents.

▍Triple Ultrasonic Sensors to Detect Overlapped Paper

Three ultrasonic sensors provide protection against double feeds by detecting and preventing overlapping pages from being fed into the scanner at the same time. Each sensor can be set to ignore or detect specified areas of a document to accommodate pages with labels or attachments.

▍Staple Detection Technology

Avision’s Staple Detection feature automatically stops the scanning process when an unremoved staple is detected. If left undetected, staples could cause errors that compromise the document, cause jams, or damage the device.

▍Plastic card or ID card uses the straight paper path

To provide scanner users with the most versatile scanning environments, the user has the choice to utilize a “Curved or Straight Paper Path”.  By opening the rear cover, users can use the straight path to transport paper to the rear of the unit. To utilize the straight paper path ensures high reliability with plastic card, ID card, thick, long paper, or more fragile documents.

▍A Document Scanner with an Imprinter

The AD8130zNP scanner can be integrated with an imprinter.  The innovative combination allows users to print a sequence number or characters physically on the front side of each page that is being scanned. By printing serial numbers, the scanned data can be tracked, matched and/or indexed with the original document.

▍A Large LCD Display

The AD8130zNP is easy to use through the clear 1.8” LCD display. By selecting your destination and pressing the “Scan” button, the scan can be done and the scanned image can be sent to your specified destination application such as e-mail, printer, or your favorable image-editing software application. Up to nine frequently used scan settings and destinations can be preset for different scanning needs.

▍Scan to Cloud with Button Manager

The AD8130zNP come with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and are bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager , AVScan , and PaperPort . With Button Manager , you can complete a scan and send the image directly to cloud servers such as Google Drive, Dropbox, Evernote, FaceBook, or Microsoft SharePoint with a press of a button. You can also save the image to searchable PDF, JPEG, BMP, or GIF file format, and scan to e-mail, or image editing application. In addition, the bundled software applications also include AVScan  and PaperPort which are are highly effective document management software to streamline your task more efficiently.  

▍Features

  • Fast, 130 ppm / 260 ipm scanning in color, grayscale and monochrome ( 300dpi )
  • Fast, 150 ppm / 300 ipm scanning in color, grayscale and monochrome ( 200dpi )
  • Support form document up to 297 x 432 mm (A3)
  • Robust 600-page  automatic document feeder
  • Daily duty cycle of up to 100,000 sheets
  • Three Ultrasonic sensors to enable or disable detection in different areas of  document
  • Staple detection feature
  • Curved or Straight Paper Path
  • Auto crop and deskew a document with the advanced image processing unit  to enhance the scanning speed
  • Latest USB 3.2 Gen1 connectivity for faster transmission speed
  • Reverse roller technology delivers outstanding feeding reliability
  • Hard and embossed card scanning up to 1.25 mm in thickness in landscape  feeding
  • Press and scan to cloud servers via the bundled software Button Manager
  • Earth-friendly LED technology
  • Long page scanning up to 6096 mm (240”)
  • Auto power off setting
 

▎Certification mark

  • Up to 1.2 s per page speed
  • Scans in Flat or V Shape mode
  • Thickness of up to 50cm
Description:
• Overhead A1+ Book Scanner
  • 600 x 600 dpi
  • Up to 1.2 s per page speed
  • Scans in Flat or V Shape mode
  • Thickness of up to 50cm
Meta: accessories_0_acc_description: Foot Switch, hardware accessory for batch scanning
Meta: features_text:
BookTEK 5 V1A-C50 is the wide format book scanner of choice for digitization projects which require formats more than DINA1+ with a thickness of up to 50cm

High-performance scanning for oversized originals

The BookTEK 5 V1A-C50 is designed for demanding digitization projects, combining speed, precision, and ease of use. Capable of handling originals up to A1 size and book thicknesses of 35 or 50 cm, this scanner streamlines workflows with its motorized glass plate and versatile book cradle. Whether working in fixed, glass-free, or fully automatic modes, this scanner delivers exceptional image quality for even the most challenging tasks.

Digitization in brilliant quality

A high-resolution linear CCD camera with laser-controlled autofocus precisely follows the curvature of books, scanning along the reading direction. Even at 600 dpi with all image enhancements activated, scanning takes only 4 seconds, and the complete cycle time, including all glass plate movements, is under 8 seconds.

Motorized glass plate

The BookTEK 5 V1A-C50 features a motorized, adjustable glass plate. Its automated movements streamline the scanning process, gently lowering onto the book to apply just the right amount of pressure for high-quality scans without damaging delicate pages.

Advanced book cradle design

The motor-driven book cradle handles books up to 35 cm high, with an optional upgrade to 50 cm, making it perfect for digitizing standard and oversized materials. Operators can easily switch between flat mode for open books and V-mode with a 140° opening angle to protect delicate spines and bindings.

Predefined book cradle modes

The BookTEK 5 V1A-C50 Book Cradle offers predefined modes for efficient scanning of various materials. Auto Mode enables fully automated operation, Book Mode scans open books flat, and V-mode gently handles delicate volumes with a 140° opening angle, ensuring excellent results while protecting fragile materials.

Dual monitor setup

With a spacious 27-inch 4K preview monitor in front of the operator for clear, detailed scanning feedback and a 21-inch Full HD multi-touchscreen for easy operation, this setup offers optimal control and visual clarity for smooth, efficient scanning.

Powerful software

Achieve exceptional scanning results with advanced features like automatic crop and deskew, as well as virtual rescan. Depending on the device type, options like finger and thumb removal, automatic width detection, or 3D scanning for authentic digitization of textured surfaces are also available. Our software further supports seamless copying and archiving, allowing you to send documents to various destinations, including SMB, FTP, printers, email, and cloud storage.

No compromises on security

All Image Access Scanners are based on a Linux operating system, which is extremely secure and virus-resistant. Nevertheless, the device is easy and intuitive to use and, when operated over the network, fits seamlessly into any Windows work environment.
